profile.name: MD. Rasel Hossain
profile.bio: Over 13.7 years of experience in Us-Bangla Airlines. Expert in Load Control, Customer Service, and Operations. Transitioning into Full Stack Web Development.

journey.desc: Leading administration and customer support teams. Expert in ticketing and crisis management.
Authorized for ATR 600, Boeing 737, Dash 8 Q400, and Airbus A330.
Managed high volumes of inbound calls and client relationships.
